mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER_TB(MEMBERID , PASSWORD, NAME, PHONENUMBER, EMAIL, MEMBERTYPE) VALUES(#{id} , #{password}, #{name}, #{phoneNumber}, #{email}, #{memberTypeId})
mapper.select: SELECT MEMBERID, MEMBERTYPE, NAME, PHONENUMBER FROM MEMBER_TB
SELECT MEMBERID as id, PASSWORD, NAME, PHONENUMBER, EMAIL, MEMBERTYPE as memberTypeId FROM MEMBER_TB WHERE memberId = #{id}
SELECT MEMBERID, PASSWORD, NAME, PHONENUMBER, EMAIL, MEMBERTYPE as memberTypeId FROM MEMBER_TB WHERE memberType = #{memberTypeId}
